pkgmetadata.longdescription: Classes and Methods for Working with Spectral Data with Space- Time Attributes // Provides S4 classes and data import, preprocessing, graphing, manipulation and export methods for geo-Spectral datasets (datasets with space/time/spectral dimensions). These type of data are frequently collected within earth observation projects (remote sensing, spectroscopy, bio- optical oceanography, mining, agricultural, atmospheric, environmental or similar branch of science).
